oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Martha White - 1952-11-22 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Martha White sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from November 22, 1952. Hosted by Ernest Tubb.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Ray Price; June Carter; Chet Atkins; Carter Sisters; Maybelle Carter; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Walking The Floor Over You (excerpt) (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Jud Collins) -- Somebody Loves You (Ernest Tubb) -- Don't Let The Stars Get In Your Eyes (Ray Price) -- Martha White jingle (A Good Man Is Hard To Find) (June Carter, Chet Atkins) -- Martha White commercial (Jud Collins) -- Martha White jingle (A Good Man Is Hard To Find) (June Carter, Chet Atkins) -- Little Liza Jane (Chet Atkins) -- A Picture, A Ring And A Curl (The Carter Sisters, Maybelle Carter) -- Goodbye Old Pal (Bill Monroe and His Blue Grass Boys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Martha White Foods; Collins, Jud; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Carter Sisters; Carter, Maybelle, 1909-1978; Carter, Anita; Carter, Helen, 1927-1998; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys
